pr_title: use actual dataInterval in cache key

timeline.message: use actual dataInterval in cache key

timeline.bodyText: I think there's an off by one here: storageAdapter.getMaxTime() is the highest timestamp in the segment, but the end of actualDataInterval is exclusive, and so it doesn't include that highest timestamp. I think doing segmentMaxTime.plus(1) will fix it. There's a similar issue in ServerManager.
timeline.author: gianm

replies.bodyText: yes, you are right, will fix it
replies.author: kaijianding
